thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location but why no shaver points ?
thread.title_full: Good location but why no shaver points ? - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: traveller195645
title: Good location but why no shaver points ?
text:
Very good location. 2 mins from tube. Plenty of places nearby to eat/drink/buy snacks
New and clean hotel
Staff good
Maybe a better option to be just a bit outside the city centre
BUT WHY - do Premier Inns now not have shaver points. You have to go and buy an adapter for your razor or toothbrush (the staff did not have any to loan)
